actions.name: Dreamcatcher
actions.description: Effect: For every creature in Range that is afflicted with @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares], the user's ATK and SPATK stats increase by 5%.

system.description: Effect: For every creature in Range that is afflicted with @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[nightmares], the user's ATK and SPATK stats increase by 5%.
